name: Quad Vector versus the Quantum Cats
name_original: Quad Vector versus the Quantum Cats
description:
Entry for Ludum Dare 35 - theme: Shapeshift

Don't forget to vote for game here:

Ludum Dare page


W - Gas! Vrooom!
A + D or arrow keys - steering wheel
B - Beep beep!

Gear stick can be moved with mouse.

F - fullscreen
M - mute

Radio works, adjust volume with left dial, change tracks by clicking on display.

Music tracks by

Antriksh Bali - http://www.antrikshbali.com/
Kiersten Redmyer - https://soundcloud.com/kiersten-redmyer
Lindar Greenwood and Alex Baker - http://thumpypuppy.com/

Disclaimer:
No quantum cats were harmed during the making of this game.

#ldjam35
#ldjam
